name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bk2Sheet: Export Chrome Bookmarks to Google Sheets

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A Chrome extension designed to export all your bookmarks seamlessly to your personal Google Sheet.


This is a 100% secure method…

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A Chrome extension designed to export all your bookmarks seamlessly to your personal Google Sheet.


This is a 100% secure method for exporting bookmarks, ensuring that none of your information is saved or stored in our drive. We prioritize your privacy—your bookmarks remain entirely yours, and you retain full ownership and control over them. With this extension, you can conveniently manage your bookmarks while maintaining complete authority over your data.
